DOC.brief_summary: We aim to test the hypothesis that Laser speckle contrast imaging allows for the measurement of cutaneous blood flow during exercise.
DOC.brief_title: Use of Laser Speckle to Study Cutaneous Blood Flow at Exercise in Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Ischemia and post occlusive reactive hyperhemia in the skin is tested in healthy normal subjects at rest and during cycle exercise.
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers Affiliation to the French health system Any disease or chronic treatment
